name: Netlify Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Netlify Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle netlify events via webhooks

siteId.name: siteId
siteId.description: Select the Site ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
siteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Site Name or ID | 作用: Select the Site ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

formId.name: formId
formId.description: Select a form. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
formId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Name or ID | 作用: Select a form. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True
